title: Silverback SBX 54" Wall Mounted Adjustable-Height Basketball Hoop with QuickPlay Design

description.detailed:
• SAVE SPACE IN YOUR DRIVEWAY – Includes wall mount, backboard, and rim suitable for indoor or outdoor installation
  • CONTINUOUS MATERIAL BACKBOARD – 54" W x 33" H Infinity Edge backboard that folds backward for increased rigidity
  • ULTRA-FAST ASSEMBLY – Assemble in 120 minutes or less with Quick-Play design and preassembled parts
  • HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE DESIGN – Adjustable from 7.5' to 10' with all-steel actuator and lock height adjustment option
  • PRO-STYLE POWDER-COATING – Product is made of powder-coated steel and backed by a 5-year limited warranty
description.short:
• 54" x 33" Infinity Edge backboard
  • Ultra-fast assembly
  • Includes wall mount, backboard, and rim for indoor and outdoor installation
  • 5-year warranty

title: Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System

description.detailed:
Players of all levels can enjoy the game of basketball with the Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System.
Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System:
  • Board size: 54" x 32"
  • Tempered glass board; 2' offset
  • Steel board frame with aluminum trim
  • Pro Image breakaway rim
  • U-Turn lift; detachable handle
  • 4" square steel pole
  • Spalding hoop system designed for outdoor residential play
description.short:
• Board size: 54" x 32"
  • Tempered glass board; 2' offset
  • U-Turn lift; Detachable handle
description.medium: The Spalding 88454G In-Ground Basketball System will transform your backyard into a basketball court. This system features a tempered glass backboard with heavy-duty steel frame to offer long lasting performance. The four-inch Square Steel PolePro Image Breakaway Rim effectively reduces the shattering of backboard and risk of hand injury. The board offset u-turn lift system allows you to adjust the rim from 7 to 10 feet in gradual increments. The ground sleeve that comes with this 54-inch glass basketball system makes for easy installation and removal of the item. Play every shot with confidence with this basketball backboard system. Made by Spalding, this is sports equipment you can trust.

category.categoryPath: Home Page/Sports & Outdoors/Sports/Basketball/In Ground Basketball Hoops

title: Lifetime Adjustable In-Ground Basketball Hoop (54-Inch Tempered Glass), 90568

description.detailed:
Lifetime Adjustable In-Ground Basketball Hoop (54-Inch Tempered Glass), Features:
  • This system has a 4" hard square pole that bolts down and comes with a two 2-piece pole
  • Crank adjust
  • 6 mm tempered glass backboard
  • Slam-it ultra rim
  • Max backboard offset of 2.5'
  • This system comes with corner guards and is packaged in 1 box
  • 5-year limited warranty
description.short: The Lifetime Crank-Adjust Bolt-Down basketball system features a 54" Tempered Glass backboard with fade-resistant graphics and a powder-coated steel frame, giving you the performance and look of a pro-style game. The Crank Adjust height adjustment mechanism easily adjusts from 7.5 to 10 feet high in infinite height increments. The system also features a heavy-duty Slam-It Ultra? Rim with a wrap-around steel brace, and includes a heavy-duty nylon net. It has a 4" square, bolt-down, powder-coated steel pole, and a 28.5" offset from pole to backboard. So bring the arena home with a basketball system from Lifetime Products.
